title: Donna Brown Private Investigator
body:
## When I was first approached about a branding project for a private investigator I thought the same thing most people would think. "Who is after me?"

### ABOUT THE PROJECT

A full rebrand of a fun client is something I think all designers dream of. I would certainly put “Private Investigator” into that category. The project started with logo development and then branched out from there

![Donna Brown Logo](/images/uploads/db-logo-standard.jpg)

We ended up working on their Brand Guidelines and establishing consistency across their collateral. The final step in the process was training the client on how to properly use their new brand guidelines and remain consistent in their branding efforts across all platforms

![Donna Brown Collateral](/images/uploads/db-branding-elements.jpg)
